Uses of Interface
org.flowable.job.api.ExternalWorkerJobQuery

  • Uses of ExternalWorkerJobQuery in org.flowable.job.api

    Methods in org.flowable.job.api that return ExternalWorkerJobQuery 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.caseDefinitionId​(String caseDefinitionId)
    Only select jobs for the given case definition.
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.caseInstanceId​(String caseInstanceId)
    Only select jobs for the given case instance.
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.category​(String category)
    Only select jobs which exist for the given category
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.categoryLike​(String categoryLike)
    Only select jobs like for the given category value
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.correlationId​(String correlationId)
    Only select jobs with the given correlationId.
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.duedateHigherThan​(Date date)
    Only select jobs where the duedate is higher then the given date.
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.duedateLowerThan​(Date date)
    Only select jobs where the duedate is lower than the given date.
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.elementId​(String elementId)
    Only select jobs which exist for the given element id
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.elementName​(String elementName)
    Only select jobs which exist for the given element name
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.exceptionMessage​(String exceptionMessage)
    Only select jobs that failed due to an exception with the given message.
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.executionId​(String executionId)
    Only select jobs which exist for the given execution
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.forUserOrGroups​(String userId, Collection<String> groups)
    Only select jobs for the given user or groups.
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.handlerType​(String handlerType)
    Select jobs which have given job handler type
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.jobId​(String jobId)
    Only select jobs with the given id
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.jobTenantId​(String tenantId)
    Only select jobs that have the given tenant id.
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.jobTenantIdLike​(String tenantIdLike)
    Only select jobs with a tenant id like the given one.
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.jobWithoutTenantId()
    Only select jobs that do not have a tenant id.
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.locked()
    Only return jobs that are locked (i.e.
    ExternalWorkerJobQuery ExternalWorkerJobQuery.lockOwner​(String lockOwner)
    Only return jobs with the given lock owner.

    Order by execution id (needs to be followed by Query.asc() or Query.desc()).

    Order by duedate (needs to be followed by Query.asc() or Query.desc()).
